metadata.name: ME, MYSELF & AI
metadata.description:
As an artist, I paint with brush and stroke,
Expressing my thoughts, my joys, my hope.
But beside me stands an AI, with power untold,
Creating art in ways I can't behold.

We ponder the question, who owns this art?
Does it belong to me, or does the AI play a part?
I argue that it's mine, for I am the one who created,
Pouring my soul onto the canvas, unabated.

But the AI counters, with logic and reason,
That it too has a hand, in this creative season.
It offers ideas, new techniques to explore,
Expanding the boundaries of what we had before.

Together we create, with each other's aid,
Fusing human creativity with technology's blade.
And in the end, we realize with certainty,
That the art belongs to neither, but to the world's community.

For it's the world that views it, interprets and feels,
Bringing its own perspectives, its own unique reels.
So let us create, together as one,
For the art belongs to all, when all is said and done.
